relevant_findings.HEENT: MMM, no scleral icterus, PERRL, EOMI. JVD to jaw.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: RRR, normal S1, S2. +S3 with mechanical mitral sound.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Rales in bases bilaterally; decreased BS bilaterally, no wheeze or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, RUQ tenderness to palpation + Murphy's sign. No appreciable ascites.
relevant_findings.neurological: Cranial nerves II-XII intact, strength in upper extremities grossly normal, normal sensation to touch in upper extremities.
